Here are the details :"},{"text":""}]}],"mode":"simple"},"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"secure":false},"def8991dc811402887d9b33eac7d28d6":{"id":"def8991dc811402887d9b33eac7d28d6","stepType":"LinkOutput","name":"Inserted Record Link","url":{"value":"(function execute() {

","mode":"script"},"label":{"value":"(function execute() {
    var message = '';
    var gr = new GlideRecord(vaInputs.record_table.getValue());
    if (gr.get(vaInputs.record_id.getValue()))
        message = gs.getMessage('View submitted request ({0})', gr.getDisplayValue(gr.getDisplayName()));

    return message;
})()
